Summaries: 11 verses in 1 section. The Surah tells us the ungratefulness of man and where it leads him. It describes the wild and unruly life style of the Arabs before Islam. It also reminds us that Allah is aware of all the hidden secrets of human souls and He will expose them on the Day of Judgment.

Verses.Text: ۞أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

Translations.Text: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺
and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines
Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—
and they certainly attest to this—
and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains
Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out
and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—
surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day
